meta.title: From CHICAGO to VATICAN CITY
meta.author: Sandy Weisz
meta.message: We're celebrating the Chicago Pope, Pope Leo XIV. He was born and raised mere miles from where I'm sitting, and now he sits atop the Catholic Church, in Vatican City. It took him many steps to get from here to there, but you can do it in just 13.

ladder.clue: Player for the division rivals of the <>
